simplesect.title: Getting prebuilt Pekwm packages
simplesect.para: Links to pre-built pekwm packages are available at the pekwm website, &http-site;.
The current version of pekwm is &current-version;.
If there's no package for your distribution, and you'd like to build one, Let us know! We'll gladly host or link to binary packages.
